title: 06/10/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/10/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses comments made by Nuggets head coach Mike Malone calling out his after yesterday's loss. Should coaches call out their team to the media? ESPN's Jeff Passan calls in to discuss the issue with the game of baseball right now. Yankees Play by play Announcers Michael Kay clarifies his comments about Gerrit Cole and hitting Josh Donaldson. And Former Navy Cornerback, Valedictorian and Senior Class President Cameron Kinley shares his story about not being allowed to defer his Navy duties to pursue an NFL roster spot.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
